briefTitle: TREXIMET (Formerly Known as TREXIMA) for the Acute Treatment of Probable Migraine (ICHD-II 1.6.1)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Parallel-group Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Tolerability of TREXIMA* (Sumatriptan Succinate/Naproxen Sodium) for a Single Moderate or Severe Headache in Adults Diagnosed With Probable Migraine Without Aura (ICHD-II 1.6.1) (*TREXIMET)
summary: This study was designed to determine the efficacy and tolerability of TREXIMET (formerly known as TREXIMA) compared to placebo for the acute treatment of probable migraine, a sub-type of migraine.

primaryOutcome.measure: Pain-Free at 2 Hours Post-dose and Sustained Pain-Free From 2-24 Hours Post-dose.
